category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED segment
name: mikroe.click.uts7segb2
short_description: UT-S 7-SEG B 2 Click is a compact add-on board that presents an easy solution for adding a numeric or hexadecimal display to your application. This board features the TLC5947, a constant-current sink LED driver from Texas Instruments, alongside six ultra-thin blue single-digit numeric displays, the JSS-3011BUB-21. The displays are small in size (0.39 inches in height) and can display letters, numbers, and symbols in a highly readable form. The host MCU can control the light intensity of the blue segments of the display.
